2_instruction: You can track how many Grim Favors you have from the Map. When the bar is full, return to the Tree of Whispers to claim a valuable cache of your choice.
1_instruction: Each whisper provides awards a number of Grim Favors upon completion.
0_instruction: Icons on the map indicate active whispers and are only available for a limited amount of time.
title: Whispers of the Dead
